column1: '''Aldúya''' was the [[Quenya]] name of the fourth day of the [[Eldar
column2: Eldarin]] six-day week, its name referring to the [[Two Trees of Valinor
column3: Two Trees]]. It was called '''Orgaladhad''' in [[Sindarin]].<ref name=App/>

column2: Númenorean]] calendar, Aldúya was replaced by [[Aldëa]] in honour of the [[Nimloth of Númenor
